mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipts(receipt_imp_uid, receipt_merchant_uid, receipt_price, receipt_discount, receipt_date, receipt_address, receipt_phone, mem_id, coupon_id, receipt_point) VALUES (#{receipt_imp_uid}, #{receipt_merchant_uid}, #{receipt_price}, #{receipt_discount}, #{receipt_date}, #{receipt_address}, #{receipt_phone}, #{mem_id}, #{coupon_id}, #{receipt_point})
